attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'Calls for legendary former Liverpool manager Bob Paisley to be granted a posthumous knighthood has won the backing of Merseyside MPs.

'Almost 30,000 fans have signed a petition on the 10 Downing Street website, arguing that Paisley's record of six league titles and three European Cups deserves more than the OBE he was awarded in his lifetime.'

Wow, almost 30,000 fans. Or, to look at the number in another way, two thirds of Anfield.

Now that's overwhelming. But if someone can be bothered to go to the effort of creating a petition to knight Mediawatch, we bet we can beat it.

rejection.details: This is not the right forum for this request see - http://www.honours.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
